EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-10-12
EmailTemplate.subject: Partner Program expansion to APJ and Why Cars Will Become The Ultimate Mobile Device
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
OCTOBER 12, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/pivotal-expands-partner-program-to-asia-pacific-and-japan-apj?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Expands Partner Program to Asia Pacific and Japan (APJ) We’re proud to expand our partner program to Asia Pacific and Japan (APJ), designed to help Asia-based enterprises build and operate software at startup speed using the Pivotal Cloud Foundry® (PCF) platform. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/pivotal-expands-partner-program-to-asia-pacific-and-japan-apj?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/why-cars-will-become-the-ultimate-mobile-device-33dbaad40118?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Why Cars Will Become The Ultimate Mobile Device Caleb Garling takes a look into the future of autonomous cars and the software and solutions they will require. Check it Out <[[https://builttoadapt.io/why-cars-will-become-the-ultimate-mobile-device-33dbaad40118?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/8-point-grid-vertical-rhythm-90d05ad95032?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> 8-Point Grid: Vertical Rhythm Elliot Dahl shows you how to establish vertical rhythm and set typography in an 8pt grid system in this post. Get the Rhythm <[[https://builttoadapt.io/8-point-grid-vertical-rhythm-90d05ad95032?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-banner&utm_campaign=s1p-registration]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/velocity-as-a-service-5-ways-to-ship-like-a-software-company?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Velocity-as-a-Service: 5 Ways to Ship Like a Software Company Richard Seroter explains the 5 key things an enterprise can do to ship with the speed and velocity of a software company. Increase your velocity <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/velocity-as-a-service-5-ways-to-ship-like-a-software-company?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/how-to-use-topic-maps-to-run-generative-user-interviews-fbbd9b74b554?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> How to Use Topic Maps to Run Generative User Interviews Hadrien Raffalli breaks down why topic maps are better suited than questionnaires for generative user interviews and the most effective way to build your own. Run More Effective User Interviews <[[https://builttoadapt.io/how-to-use-topic-maps-to-run-generative-user-interviews-fbbd9b74b554?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/from-monolith-to-a-system-of-systems-ep-46?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> From Monolith to a System of Systems (Ep. 46) Oliver Gierke joins Jeff and Dormain to share his thoughts on refactoring monolithic applications using what he calls a system of systems approach. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/from-monolith-to-a-system-of-systems-ep-46?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-gemfire-on-aws-going-fast-from-zero-to-cache-cluster?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal GemFire Now Available in the AWS Marketplace Pivotal Gemfire is now available in the Amazon Web Services marketplace. Jon Roberts explains how easy it is to now run Gemfire on the industry's leading public cloud infrastructure. Read More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-gemfire-on-aws-going-fast-from-zero-to-cache-cluster?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 10/24 Analytics Innovation Roadshow, San Francisco <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/san-francisco?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
10/25 Continuous Delivery: Fly the Friendly CI in Pivotal Cloud Foundry with Concourse, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/oct-25-continuous-delivery-fly-the-friendly-ci-in-pivotal-cloud-foundry-with-concourse?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
10/26 Messaging for Cloud-Native and Migrated Apps: What’s New with RabbitMQ for PCF, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/oct-26-messaging-for-cloud-native-and-migrated-apps-what-s-new-with-rabbitmq-for-pcf-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
10/29-10/30 Cloud-Native Architecture Fundamentals, New York <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/software-architecture/sa-training-ny/public/schedule/detail/63240]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
